item.title: TRON: Catalyst launches June 17
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/tron-catalyst-launches-june-17

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Story-driven isometric action adventure game dated.

Story-driven isometric action adventure game TRON: Catalyst will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam on June 17, publisher Big Fan Games and developer Bithell Games announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Big Fan Games:

About

TRON: Catalyst pulls you back into the world of Disney’s TRON to battle multiple opposing factions in the latest imaginative story from Bithell Games (Thomas Was Alone, Subsurface Circular, TRON: Identity). TRON: Catalyst is an all-new story-driven, isometric action adventure game, set in the immersive and diverse locations of the Arq Grid introduced in TRON: Identity.

Play as Exo, a highly resilient and resourceful program wielding an unexpected power known as the Glitch, gaining strength and abilities which the overlords of the Arq Grid’s crumbling society seek to bring under control. Ride Light Cycles, engage in Identity Disc combat, and more as you’re relentlessly pursued through the city and beyond by Conn, a malevolent program with an agenda of his own, while uncovering more about the glitches that threaten the stability of this world.

Key Features

  • Dynamic Combat System – Battle a legion of fearsome enemy programs in melee and ranged combat, both on-foot and while riding a Light Cycle. Master advanced techniques like parrying and Disc kicks to gain the upper hand, while exploring the Arq Grid and collecting Data Shards to upgrade your code base with new abilities.
  • Immersive New Story – Dive into an original TRON storyline. Meet the programs of the Arq Grid, uncover their secrets and fight to survive in a chase across the city and outlands. Playing as Exo, a courier working in this grid’s capital city, your life is turned upside down when a mysterious package explodes, granting you powers beyond any program’s normal function. With the Arq Grid’s ruthless ‘peacekeepers’ in hot pursuit, you’ll unlock the mysteries of this grid, and learn what kind of hero it needs you to become.
  • Exploit The Glitch – The Arq Grid is losing stability. Glitches roll back the clock, catching the world in a series of system level time loops… and only you can see them. Utilize Exo’s unique ability to uncover secret areas and shortcuts, and influence the factions jostling for control over the Arq Grid.
  • Authentic World of TRON – Explore the neon-lit streets of the Arq Grid on foot or Light Cycle, and navigate your way through the intriguing—often dangerous—characters that inhabit this high-stakes world. Travel through a diverse Grid filled with intriguing stories within a budding revolution all set to an immersive soundtrack from composer Dan Le Sac (TRON: Identity). If you’re a fan of Disney’s TRON, get ready to step into the universe you love like never before. If you’re new to this story, prepare for a thrilling adventure.

Now… finish the game.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

item.title: Jump Ship launches in Early Access this summer for Xbox Series, PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/jump-ship-launches-in-early-access-this-summer-for-xbox-series-pc

  • PC
  • Xbox Series

Mission-based cooperative first-person shooter from former Hazelight, Mojang, and Coffee Stain Studios developers.

Mission-based cooperative first-person shooter Jump Ship will launch in Early Access for Xbox Series and PC via Steam this summer, publisher Coffee Stain Publishing and developer Keepsake Games announced. Sign-ups for the closed beta test are available here.

“Our goal was to create a game that balances the fun and immersion of space exploration,” said Keepsake Games CEO Daniel Kaplan in a press release. “Coming from Hazelight, Mojang, and Coffee Stain, we understand how to make a great co-op game, and we’ve reached a point where player input is vital in order for us to make Jump Ship as good as it can be. That’s why we’re releasing into Early Access this summer—to work directly with our players, listen to their feedback, and combine it with our vision.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Coffee Stain Publishing:

Jump Ship is a mission based co-op FPS in which players can transition seamlessly from crewing their very own space ship to on-foot exploration and space walks. The goal of each mission is to survive with the crew’s ship intact and make the next jump, picking up valuable resources, blueprints and weapons along the way. While one crewmate is piloting the ship, another might be putting out fires or fixing radiation leaks on the deck, while the rest of the group boards enemy vessels or battle through volatile space stations to make off with precious supplies.

In Jump Ship, the galaxy is filled with handcrafted celestial settings, from vast asteroid rings dominating the horizon to distant, luminescent nebulas radiating kaleidoscopic light. The scenery changes with each jump, as players go from boarding and pillaging a rival corvette-class ship to salvaging shipwrecks floating in vacuum or exploring an abandoned research facility.

However, deep space hides many other, more celestial threats, as solar flares and meteor showers regularly threaten to end players’ spacefaring journeys in an instant.

Watch a new set of trailers below.

Beta Launch Trailer

Gameplay Moments

item.title: 33 Immortals launches in Early Access on March 18
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/33-immortals-launches-in-early-access-on-march-18

  • PC
  • Xbox Series

Cooperative roguelike action game dated.

Cooperative roguelike action game 33 Immortals will launch in Early Access for Xbox Series and PC via Epic Games Store and Microsoft Store on March 18, developer Thunder Lotus Games announced. It will also be available via Game Pass.

“The release of 33 Immortals will mark a monumental milestone for Thunder Lotus,” said 33 Immortals creative director Stephan Logier. “We’re proud to finally be able to deliver a genuinely unique co-op experience. We look forward to seeing how players will tackle the challenges of facing God’s wrath together.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Thunder Lotus Games:

About

33 Immortals is an ambitious 33-player action-roguelike that invites players to “face the wrath of God” in a “lean, mean distillation of the MMO raid experience.”

In 33 Immortals, players are damned souls, rebelling against God’s final judgment. The game’s quick and seamless matchmaking launches 33 players into punchy cooperative roguelike raids, in a radically streamlined re-imagining of the massively multiplayer online experience Thunder Lotus has dubbed “pick-up and raid.” Players optimize their builds to match their playstyle, mixing and matching weapons, perks, and persistent upgrades to steadily improve their rebellion’s odds of withstanding the wrath of God. Above all, 33 Immortals actively encourages players to collaborate throughout the runs, to ensure that the largest and strongest group possible survives the enemy hordes, and prevails in the showstopping boss fights.

33 Immortals is the debut online multiplayer title for Thunder Lotus, the studio best known for immersive single player experiences like the two million unit-selling Spiritfarer. To meet the unique challenges of its first foray into online games, Thunder Lotus expanded its operations to two parallel development teams, with the 33 Immortals development team being made up of industry veterans well-versed in online multiplayer.

Key Features

  • 33-player cooperative combat against hordes of enemies and massive bosses.
  • Instant “pick-up and raid” matchmaking gets you straight into the action.
  • Ultra-fast runs through a streamlined distillation of the massively multiplayer online raid experience.
  • Randomized foes, challenges, and rewards ensure no roguelike run is ever the same.
  • An epic arsenal of weapons empowered by sins and virtues, each with their own unique combat style.
  • Hundreds of upgrade combinations and character builds.
  • Customize your character with a wide variety of cosmetics.
  • Beautiful hand­-drawn art and animation.
  • A richly textured world inspired by Dante’s Divine Comedy.

Watch a new trailer below.

Early Access Release Date Trailer

item.title: Balatro ‘Friends of Jimbo (Pack 4)’ update now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/balatro-friends-of-jimbo-pack-4-update-now-available

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Smartphone
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Collaborations with Assassin's Creed, Fallout, Rust, and more.

Publisher Playstack and developer LocalThunk have released a free update for Balatro titled “Friends of Jimbo (Pack 4),” which features collaborations with Assassin’s Creed, Bugsnax, Critical Role, Dead by Daylight, Fallout (Vault-Tec),Rust, Sid Meier’s Civilization VII, Slay the Princess. Balatro is also now available via Game Pass.

Balatro is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, PC via Steam, iOS, and Android.

Watch the update launch trailer below.

“Friends of Jimbo (Pack 4)” Update Trailer

item.title: DON’T NOD and Tiny Bull Studios announce top-down action RPG The Lonesome Guild for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/02/dont-nod-and-tiny-bull-studios-announce-top-down-action-rpg-the-lonesome-guild-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out this fall.

Publisher DON’T NOD and developer Tiny Bull Studios have announced The Lonesome Guild, a single-player top-down action RPG coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam this fall.

Here is an overview of the game, via DON’T NOD:

About

In a world consumed by loneliness, only friendship can save the day. Lead a quirky cast in this colorful single-player action RPG full of heart, battles, and bonds that change everything.

The world might be lonely, but you don’t have to be.

A Tale of Togetherness in a World Apart

The Lonesome Guild is a single-player top-down action RPG all about togetherness. Embark on a heroic adventure as Ghost, a spirit who wakes to find they hold no memories.

The world has become shrouded by loneliness and the mist just keeps spreading, corrupting everyone in its path. Now it’s up to you to get the band back together… even if they’re meeting for the first time.

Six Misfits, One Goal

The ragtag group of unlikely friends you’ll recruit each will bring their own story, quirks, motives, and abilities.

Switch seamlessly between the six of them during exploration and combat to navigate Etere, solve puzzles, and defeat enemies!

Bond and Battle

Relationships are the heart and soul of The Lonesome Guild—it’s a party, literally. As your friendship grows, so does your power with new abilities and combos.

A party can only be strong if each member is strong too—unravel your new friends’ stories and help them find peace.

Unlock side quests, new abilities, and heartfelt chats by the campfire. Together, we’re unstoppable!

Fights That Keep You on Your Toes

Three difficulty levels, a roster of cool abilities, one very powerful Ghost power.

Test your might in intense battles where you can switch between characters whenever you fancy and ambush enemies with clever combos.

Build your dream team and fight your way through Etere.

A World Worth Fighting for

Etere is full of charm and secrets, mystery and treasures to uncover.

From unearthing old secrets in the ruins to gathering round campfires in the forest, there’s always something new around the corner in The Lonesome Guild.

Solve puzzles, explore vibrant landscapes, and find shiny things as you restore balance and hope to the world.

Watch the announcement trailer below.

Announce Trailer
